items.title: Meta is reportedly downsizing its legacy AI research team
items.summary: Meta is planning to axe around 600 roles within its legacy AI research division, according to a report from Axios. The layoffs will reportedly impact Meta’s Fundamental AI Research unit, also known as FAIR, while the company continues to hire workers for its newly formed superintelligence team, TBD Lab. Meta kicked off an AI hiring […]

What we love

If you’re tired of dealing with messy cables, this puck-shaped gadget can help. items.title: Lenovo’s 2025 IdeaPad Slim 3x touchscreen Snapdragon Copilot+ PC with 16GB RAM/512GB SSD is down to $500 low
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops Lenovo’s IdeaPad Slim 3x Copilot+ PC with a Snapdragon X processor down to $499.99 shipped. This 2025 model with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD typically goes for $750 at Lenovo where it’s currently at $550. Today’s deal at Amazon, however, beats that and shaves $250 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it first hit earlier this year and more recently during the fall Prime Day sale. We’ve seen the 16GB RAM/256GB variant go for less, but this is the lowest we have seen this 16GB RAM/512GB SSD model fetch. Head below for more details.

The introduction of Galaxy XR also marked the arrival of a new AI-native device category, due to the headset’s deep integration with Google […]

items.title: Prepaid SIM Card Registrations To Be Limited To Two Per Telco For Malaysians
items.summary:
The government is planning to introduce new limits for prepaid SIM card registrations. For Malaysians, registrations will be capped at two per telco. Meanwhile, foreigners will only be able to register for two prepaid SIM cards in total. Deputy Communications Minister Teo Nie Ching explained that this change is meant to combat online fraud and […]

items.title: Now even lower: Giant $444 price drop hits this 2TB 11-inch M4 iPad Pro at Amazon today
items.summary:
Amazon has now dropped what was already a giant discount on this 11-inch M4 iPad Pro configuration even lower this morning. We caught a big-time price drop yesterday on this model, but it has now dropped once again to deliver the best price we have ever tracked at nearly $450 off.

items.title: Bring projections to holiday displays with Govee’s Matter Outdoor Decoration Light at a second-ever $80 low (Reg. $120)
items.summary:
By way of its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering a return of the best rate on its new Matter Outdoor Decoration Projector Light for $79.99 shipped. Coming down from its full $120 price, this new model hasn’t been on the market for a full month, but has been mostly seeing price cuts to $90, save for the single drop to $80 that we saw two weeks ago during Prime Day. That low price is coming back around for a second-chance opportunity, giving you a $40 markdown that will arrive before Halloween, just in time to join your Spooktacular holiday display.

more…

items.title: Bring home this posable 6-inch Deluxe Aloy Playstation action figure at just $15 to add to your collection
items.summary:
PlayStation Horizon Forbidden West Deluxe 6-inch Aloy Action Figure

Buy for $14.50 (Reg. $29.50)

What we love

As if ripped straight from Horizon Forbidden West, you can now bring home this 6-inch Aloy action figure to join your collectibles or simply add decoration to your gaming room/station setup. Not only does she have 42 points of articulation so you can pose to your preference, but you’ll also get 15 accessories to add on too, with six face plates, six hand sets, and of course her hunting essentials. On the same landing page, you can find other popular characters from across multiple Sony game franchises. 

more…

items.title: Slide your MacBook or Surface laptop in Lenovo’s all-black backpack for just $13 Prime shipped
items.summary:
Lenovo B215 Laptop Backpack

Buy for $13 (Reg. $18)

What we love

If you want an affordable way to tote any modern MacBook or simliarly-sized PC laptop around, you’re in luck. At under $13, this backpack offers a solid value. I really dig the simplistic, yet modern design here. What I appreciate most of all is that the low price means you won’t feel too bad if it gets scuffed or stained down the road.

I have been a strong proponent for the Burton Goods leathercraft accessories for quite some time now, and I can’t recommend it’s Apple Watch bands enough for folks with an affinity for timeless American-made goods, and you can now land 30% off all of its leather bands using code AW30 at checkout.
